International schools in Spain shut after receiving bomb threatsSeveral international schools in Spain were checked by police with sniffer dogs while others did not open on Monday after receiving emailed bomb threats which the Interior Ministry said were a hoax. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 12:12:17 GMT AUJUR5KVMBIW7GR4WCKYNUZM4U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/international-schools-spain-shut-after-receiving-bomb-threats-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
CIA chief to meet Israeli, Qatari officials on Monday for hostage deal talks - AxiosCIA director Bill Burns is set to meet Qatari Prime Minister Mohammed bin Abdulrahman Al Thani and the head of Israel's Mossad spy agency in Warsaw on Monday to discuss a potential new deal to secure the release of Israeli hostages held by Hamas in Gaza, Axios reported, citing two U.S. and Israeli officials. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:33:23 GMT ZXBAVQV3F5I6VAJJ3BN2P3M52E https://www.reuters.com/world/cia-chief-meet-israeli-qatari-officials-monday-hostage-deal-talks-axios-2023-12-18/Reuters世界
Italy considers taking part in Red Sea maritime coalition, source saysItaly is considering whether to join a Western naval coalition meant to protect ships in the Red Sea from attacks by the Iran-aligned Houthis of Yemen, a source close to the matter told Reuters on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:32:52 GMT 6AZCQVEW5BPLRHLLWUKAKU4JUU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/italy-considers-take-part-red-sea-maritime-coalition-source-says-2023-12-18/Angelo Amante世界中东
Ukrainian troops face artillery shortages, scale back some operations - commanderFrontline Ukrainian troops face shortages of artillery shells and have scaled back some military operations because of a shortfall of foreign assistance, a senior army general told Reuters. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:31:00 GMT CYIJEGMJG5K75CS3O3S5RWSKLA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-troops-face-artillery-shortages-scale-back-some-operations-commander-2023-12-18/Olena Harmash, Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
Results due in Egypt election with Sisi expected to sweep to third termResults in Egypt's presidential election are due to be announced on Monday, with Abdel Fattah al-Sisi expected to secure a third term that would keep him in power till 2030 in a vote in which he faced no serious challengers. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:27:56 GMT RORIJMQAIVM5XIOIPWUPTDGXAE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/results-due-egypt-election-with-sisi-expected-sweep-third-term-2023-12-18/Farah Saafan世界非洲
DUP does not expect Northern Ireland deal by Christmas - spokespersonNorthern Ireland's Democratic Unionist Party does not expect to reach a deal with London to secure its return to the power-sharing government by Christmas, a spokesperson for the region's largest pro-British party said on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:15:49 GMT 4S2OS7EKZZP6NHI6CQNDEXN7MA https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/dup-does-not-expect-northern-ireland-deal-by-christmas-spokesperson-2023-12-18/Reuters世界英国
Wars raise profit outlook for US defense industry in 2024When the Pentagon pulled the world's biggest defense contractors into a meeting to tell them to ramp up production shortly after Russia invaded Ukraine, one CEO hesitated, saying they did not want to be stuck with a warehouse full of rockets when the fighting stopped, according to three people familiar with the discussion. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:06:45 GMT QO3677UJBBMMBCUPKV5JBDBNMM https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/wars-raise-profit-outlook-us-defense-industry-2024-2023-12-18/Mike Stone商业航空航天与国防
Trump to install loyalists to reshape U.S. foreign policy on China, NATO and UkraineDonald Trump in a second term would likely install loyalists in key positions in the Pentagon, State Department and CIA whose primary allegiance would be to him, allowing him more freedom than in his first presidency to enact isolationist policies and whims. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 11:05:21 GMT LS24WETJS5LWTHS2HGWLTQOXEU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/trump-install-loyalists-reshape-us-foreign-policy-diplomats-gird-doomsday-2023-12-18/Gram Slattery, Simon Lewis, Idrees Ali, Phil Stewart世界美国
Gaza church killings at odds with war on Hamas, Italy tells IsraelItalian Foreign Minister Antonio Tajani criticised Israeli forces on Monday for allegedly shooting and killing people in a Christian compound in the Gaza Strip, saying such actions would not help in its war to defeat Hamas. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 10:42:40 GMT PPU7LNEISNPJREDM6L5UAK6HXY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-church-killings-odds-with-war-hamas-italy-tells-israel-2023-12-18/Reuters世界中东
In Israel, US defence chief to look to next phase of Gaza warU.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin arrived in Israel on Monday for talks expected to focus on Israel's eventual end to high intensity war in Gaza and its transition to a more limited, focused conflict, officials say. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 09:03:38 GMT 475NS2B6TBOKHLK4WWTJ6GY67I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-us-defence-chief-look-next-phase-gaza-war-2023-12-18/Reuters世界中东
Eviction, threats and suicidal thoughts: Uganda's LGBT community endures trying yearAs a Ugandan court hears a challenge on Monday to one of the world's harshest anti-LGBT laws, there's more at stake than the simple constitutionality of the statute. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 08:08:14 GMT O4AIY76ATZNG3IWJD57QL4VJR4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/eviction-threats-suicidal-thoughts-ugandas-lgbt-community-endures-trying-year-2023-12-18/Reuters世界非洲
